flightSelection.title: Flight Selection Questionnaire
flightSelection.description: Evaluate your experience after selecting the flights.

baggageSelection.title: Baggage Selection Questionnaire
baggageSelection.description: Evaluate your experience after selecting the baggage.

overallExperience.title: Overall Experience Questionnaire
overallExperience.description: Evaluate your experience on each type of page.

questions.informationRetrievalSpeed: I quickly found the relevant information.
questions.elementDistraction: Highlighted elements distract when they are not relevant.
questions.visualAppeal: The appearance of the page is pleasant and attractive to me.
questions.professionalAppearance: The appearance of the page conveys professionalism.
questions.serviceQuality: The appearance of the page conveys confidence in the quality of the services offered.
questions.priceExpectation: The appearance of the page makes me expect high prices.
